Title: Grants provisional MWBE certification status for applicants who are not approved or denied for MWBE status within ninety days of applying
Summary: Grants provisional MWBE certification status for one year for applicants who do not receive a determination approving or denying their application for MWBE certification within ninety days of applying.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to granting provisional MWBE certification status for applicants who are not approved or denied for MWBE status within ninety days
